Html:
Great work ...
i use 3d points on a projects but when i triangulate them as a result i get 2d points for the extra created points. it means i can not use them for making isolines on Autocad. Trying a couple of months to find a solution and finally i got it. i compile project with USE_Z and USE_ATTRIBS params and on the first attribute i set the Z. The triangulation calculates attributes and the result of first attribute is Z value of the point. after the triangulation i replace z value with attribute[0] and i have what i want
Thanks for bringing up this issue. When compiling with USE_Z, the z coordinate should be interpolated properly.
